name: Closure (itch) (Solid Squid Contingent)
description:
A short story game about death, life and the inevitabilities one delays in-between.

Homework assignment: Compare and contrast with Hikari’s Journey 光の旅 — the umbral world.

Content warning: Death in traffic accident, long discussions on death, potentially bleak and depressing world view.

Credits:

EverythingJunber
